about_the_game:
Upward, an exhilarating platform game, revolves around the protagonist finding themselves on a mysterious island after a plane crash. Our charming hero, determined to escape the island, focuses on reaching the highest points of the platforms encountered throughout the journey. However, this mission proves to be much more complex and filled with adventure than anticipated.

In each level, obstacles abound, not only comprising physical challenges but also featuring various traps that demand strategic thinking and quick reflexes. The platforms, designed with meticulous care, ascend in difficulty as you climb upward, offering a spectrum of colors tailored to each level. This ensures that every stage of the game presents players with new excitement and challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 / Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-12100F / Core™ i5-7600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600X
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Upward is a platform game where we progress upwards, overcoming obstacles on an island where we crashed with a plane accident. On 10 different levels, each featuring distinct colors, various platforms, and challenges await you.
